nodes.text: The deep caverns were a series of caves located in the Tomb, an ancient prison built on the planet Belsavis by the Rakata. Accessible via Frozencavern Canyon, the caverns were overrun by the Esh-kha species during the invasion of Belsavis, and Captain Devlin's soldiers were held captive in the caverns.
The deep caverns appear as a location of the Tomb on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and are the site of the Republic mission "Riot."
